info.author: Vladimir Ermakov
info.description:
.. -*- mode: rst -*-

===========================
django-extended-attachments
===========================

django-extended-attachments is a file storage application
with following features:

- Automatic thumbnail generation
- Antivirus check
- SHA1 checksums
- MediaWiki file path style
- File description
- Access permission check callbacks
- Deduplication

This application based on `django-attachments`
and `django-filetransfers`.

Requires
~~~~~~~~

- django-extensions
- django >= 1.2
- python >= 2.6

.. -*- mode: rst -*-

0.4.0
~~~~~

- First standalone version (previous in robobb)
- Backends base classes moved from `\*_base.py` into `__init__.py`
info.name: django-extended-attachments
info.summary: A generic Django application to attach Files (Attachments) to any model
